title: U B U W E B Film & Video Ali Akbar Sadeghi The Rook ( 197

sources.title: UBUWEBFilmVideoAliAkbarSadeghiTheRook197
sources.description: Synopsis The Rook is a reference to Persian painting and miniature. The chess board act as witness to a game in progress. The players move their pieces until two kings remain and the game back to continue from the beginning which represent ongoing metaphor of political power games.
